info.name: Aqara Vibration Sensor Sensitivity Update
info.description:
In the Aqara app, you can supposedly also adjust the sensitivity. However, you probably have to use a hub to do this. If you use the Aqara sensors without a Xiaomi hub on a deCONZ Conbee/RaspBee II. They are first taught in there.

If this is successful, you can adjust the sensitivity of the sensors (and certainly more) using the console and curl or using the endpoint explorer via the deCONZ REST API.

request.description:
The result is a longer JSON string with all the sensors.

Depending on how many sensors there are, you may need to search for the corresponding sensor in the response payload to identify the sensor ID for whicht the change is inteded.

The sensors are simply numbered in ascending order from 1.
Shows just the configuration of the selected sensor for better investigation of its current values.
